TopicTitle: Look at this very effecient Mun Flyby, Please Submit your own nifty orbits!

Articles.Content:
If I set up a maneuver node at Mun Peria psis, only needs about 200m/s of delta v to get home. I did this completely on accident. Sad thing is the contracts mean I have to actually orbit.

Edited January 21, 2018 by CrazyJebGuy

Sometimes the stars align, and then sometimes the planets do too! nice work 

This could become a challenge: "threading the needle" how many un-powered flybys can you get!! (probably 6 unless you can increase the conic patch limit!)
